subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United reached the League Cup final, beating Derby County, 4-2, behind a goal from Cristiano Ronaldo. United advanced with a 4-3 advantage in total goals. On Wednesday, Tottenham will try to protect a 4-1 advantage over Burnley to assure itself a spot in the March 1 League Cup final.
